content: the garden walk shawl was designed for the evening walks in your garden after all the work for the day has been done you can slip this airy shawl over your shoulders and admire all the work you have put into your garden this shawl is knit from the top down and the pattern uses mostly charts for the instructions meeting gauge for this project is not necessary different yarn weights and needle sizes can be used which will result in larger or smaller shawls i hope you enjoy knitting this shawl and get to go on many garden walks while wearing this shawl professional tech edited by agneskroner /people/agneskroner
